page.title: 17Attitudes on Education
page.content: by Rohit, Saief and Stephen - aged 11 { {Maths}: Maths is a very useful subject that everyone should do to enable them to get jobs at a later date. {English}: This is the most important subject in school. It is especially important in jobs which invlove english ie newspaper editor. {Computer Studies}: This subject is very useful because, in the future computers will be involved in every day life. {Geography}: Geography helps us to know the land on which we live. If you wanted to start a farm you would need to know if the soil was good. {French}: Its important to learn another language to enable you to go abroad. It is sensible to learn French because it is the closest country to Britain.
